title: Sam Houston: The Life and Times of the Liberator of Texas, an Authentic American Hero
description: From Simon & Schuster, Sam Houston is John William's vivid, exciting biography of one of the giants of nineteenth-century America.Sam Houston was one of the most extraordinary figures in American history. During his life, he held an astonishing range of governor of two states (Tennessee and Texas), congressman (Tennessee), senator (Texas), and president of the Republic of Texas during its independence.
author: John Hoyt Williams
